channel.title: Make 2 sections for advertising?
channel.description:
Well, pretty much every single thread i look at , its a server leeched from someone else.
I think you shud make 2 sub forums,
One for so called "Leeched" servers, and another for servers that you have made completely yourself, or close enough...
Cause seriously i just been going through them the last 5 minutes, an a shit load of them have the name "isle" in it, from that satan's isle source , or w/e it is.
Can no one make there own servers these days? Wat do u all think ?

item.title: Make 2 sections for advertising?
item.dc:creator: @X_Teh_Nick_X X Teh Nick X
item.description:
@X_Teh_Nick_X wrote:

That wont happen, every server is leeched from a source lol.
Do you know how hard it is to code a server from scratch lol ?
But there is too many satan isle’s in there, just being a source.

Read full topic
